org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc

类 FencedRpcEndpoint<F extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.FencedRpcEndpoint<F>
  • 类型参数:
    F - type of the fencing token
    所有已实现的接口:
    RpcGateway
    直接已知子类:
    Dispatcher, JobMaster, ResourceManager

    public class FencedRpcEndpoint<F extends java.io.Serializable>
extends RpcEndpoint
    Base class for fenced RpcEndpoint. A fenced rpc endpoint expects all rpc messages being enriched with fencing tokens. Furthermore, the rpc endpoint has its own fencing token assigned. The rpc is then only executed if the attached fencing token equals the endpoint's own token.

        protected void setFencingToken(@Nullable

      • getMainThreadExecutor

        protected RpcEndpoint.MainThreadExecutor getMainThreadExecutor()
        Returns a main thread executor which is bound to the currently valid fencing token. This means that runnables which are executed with this executor fail after the fencing token has changed. This allows to scope operations by the fencing token.
        覆盖:
        getMainThreadExecutor 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        返回:
        MainThreadExecutor bound to the current fencing token

      • runAsyncWithoutFencing

        protected void runAsyncWithoutFencing(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Run the given runnable in the main thread of the RpcEndpoint without checking the fencing token. This allows to run operations outside of the fencing token scope.
        参数:
        runnable - to execute in the main thread of the rpc endpoint without checking the fencing token.

      • callAsyncWithoutFencing

        protected <V> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<V> callAsyncWithoutFencing(java.util.concurrent.Callable<V> callable,
                                                                                Time timeout)
        Run the given callable in the main thread of the RpcEndpoint without checking the fencing token. This allows to run operations outside of the fencing token scope.
        参数:
        callable - to run in the main thread of the rpc endpoint without checkint the fencing token.
        timeout - for the operation.
        返回:
        Future containing the callable result.
